critique: This document is an executive order regarding pay adjustments for various government employees and members of the uniformed services. It does not touch upon immigration, civil liberties, or social issues. It primarily deals with the economic regulation of government salaries and federalism by setting pay scales for federal employees. There is no clear ideological tilt.
